Based on the given list, I would recommend "Take a Break". It is a romantic comedy movie that was released in 2007. The movie stars Akshay Kumar, Deepika Padukone, Rajkumar Patel and Armaan Khan. The movie revolves around two lovers who are forced to go their separate ways due to various circumstances. However, the two lovers never give up on each other and they continue to try and be together despite all the obstacles that come their way. In the end, the two lovers succeed in being together once again after going through all the difficulties that came their way along the way. The movie has received good reviews from critics for its entertaining storyline, well acted by actors and supporting cast members and excellent production values.
